name: Gala Study Timer
description: A browser extension built with Manifist V3. Functionalities include timers with customizable lengths, to-do list, and progress tracking that is stored locally in the browser.

img1.alt: A screenshot of the timer in use, showing 20 minutes remaining.

img2.alt: A screenshot of the timer in use, showing 7 minutes remaining. A side tab is open showing two tasks, one complete and one incomplete.

img3.alt: A screenshot of the timer. A side tab is open showing various settings for configuring the timer.
